title: datos_anonimizados.xlsx
description: Este dataset contiene información sobre los participantes de las ediciones 1 a 3 de Alta Ciencia Abierta que firmaron un consentimiento informado y aceptaron compartir sus datos de forma anónima.

variables.name: pronombre_IN
variables.description: Self-identified pronoun of the participant [English].

variables.name: accesibilidad_IN
variables.description: Indicates whether the participant requested any accessibility support during the training or event [English].

variables.name: accesibilidad_categoria_IN
variables.description: Specific type of accessibility support requested (e.g., screen reader, captioning, color contrast) [English].

variables.name: conociste_MD_IN
variables.description: Channel or source through which the participant first heard about MetaDocencia (e.g., social media, recommendation, website) [English].

variables.name: pais_IN
variables.description: Country of residence of the participant at the time of the survey [English].

variables.name: grupo_IN
variables.description: Underrepresented or marginalized group in science with which the participant identifies, if any [English].

variables.name: nivel_educativo_IN
variables.description: Highest level of formal education completed by the participant [English].

variables.name: area_formacion_IN
variables.description: Participant’s field of academic training or disciplinary background (e.g., Social Sciences, Engineering, Humanities) [English].

variables.name: investigacion_IN
variables.description: Indicates whether the participant currently engages in research activities [English].

variables.name: conoces_proyecto_IN
variables.description: Participant's familiarity with preregistration of research projects as an open science practice [English].

variables.name: conoces_pgd_IN
variables.description: Participant's familiarity with publishing a data management plan openly [English].

variables.name: conoces_hipotesis_IN
variables.description: Participant's familiarity with the open sharing of research hypotheses [English].

variables.name: conoces_datos_IN
variables.description: Participant's familiarity with openly sharing research data [English].

variables.name: conoces_codigo_IN
variables.description: Participant's familiarity with openly sharing research code [English].

variables.name: conoces_instrumentos_IN
variables.description: Participant's familiarity with openly sharing research instruments such as surveys or protocols [English].

variables.name: conoces_resultados1_IN
variables.description: Participant's experience or familiarity with publishing research results openly in academic journals [English].

variables.name: conoces_resultados2_IN
variables.description: Participant's experience or familiarity with publishing research results in alternative formats (e.g., blogs, podcasts) [English].

variables.name: animas_IN
variables.description: Indicates whether and how the participant encourages others to adopt open science practices [English].

variables.name: importante_preregistrar_IN
variables.description: Participant's perceived importance of preregistering research projects [English].

variables.name: importante_instrumentos_IN
variables.description: Participant's perceived importance of sharing research instruments openly [English].

variables.name: importante_datos_IN
variables.description: Participant's perceived importance of openly sharing research data [English].

variables.name: importante_codigo_IN
variables.description: Participant's perceived importance of openly sharing research code [English].

variables.name: importante_resultados1_IN
variables.description: Participant's perceived importance of publishing research results in open academic journals [English].

variables.name: importante_resultados2_IN
variables.description: Participant's perceived importance of publishing research results in alternative open formats such as blogs or podcasts [English].

variables.name: cohorte
variables.description: Variable collected during the MetaDocencia Alta Ciencia Abierta workshops [description not yet provided].
